text:
Fairview is a city in Brown County, Kansas, United States. As of the 2010 census, 260 people lived there.
History.
Fairview was founded in 1872. It was named for its scenic setting.
Geography.
According to the United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
As of the 2010 census says that there were 260 people, 130 households, and 71 families living in the city.
